AboutSection.desc: Hello everyone, I am a software engineer with experience in web application development and business systems. My educational background includes a Master's degree in Cultural Systems from Yamagata University and a Bachelor's degree in Rehabilitation Medicine from Chengdu Medical College University. Despite my diverse academic background, I have built a strong career in software development, specializing in full-stack development with technologies like TypeScript, JavaScript, React, Python, and various databases.
AboutSection.para1: I have been working at Sunborn Corporation since January 2023, developing consolidated accounting systems for major trading companies using technologies like TypeScript, Python, React, Django, and Snowflake. Additionally, I have been working part-time at Otus Corporation since October 2022, developing portal sites and web applications.
AboutSection.para2: Previously, I worked at M.S.I Corporation from July 2020 to October 2022, where I developed business management systems and created a staff location management web application that was later commercialized.
AboutSection.para3: I'm constantly learning new technologies and improving my skills. I hold a Deep Learning certification (JDLA Deep Learning for ENGINEER), which reflects my interest in AI and machine learning. I'm passionate about creating efficient, maintainable code and enjoy problem-solving.
AboutSection.para4: I'm always looking for new challenges and opportunities to grow as a developer. Feel free to contact me if you're interested in collaborating or have any questions about my work!
AboutSection.intro_end: , a software engineer. Currently, I'm building cool web applications. My world revolves around web development and AI innovation. My hobbies are gaming and photography.
